ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Leeroy Jenkins
ygData.msgSnippet: My brother was on a raid in Plane of Fire the other day and one of their group members got behind the boss of the zone (can t remember which god it was) and
ygData.messageBody:
My brother was on a raid in Plane of Fire the other day and one of their group members got behind the boss of the zone (can't remember which god it was) and one of the people got too close to the other mobs that spawned to block the way out. I think there were about 6 of them. Not sure. Matt, you were there. What happened? I just watched the carnage on my brother's screen. I was told that people made jokes about "Leeroy" afterwards.
luv,
-Su


==== At 2005-06-05, 09:48:00 you wrote: =======

>Yep, that should be it. I don't know if thats the main one but I did
>like that one alot. All I can say is that the guys at SOE and ILM
>(Assuming they are the ones that made this) have way to much fun and
>time on their hands!
>
>(Regarding Leeroy...)
>LOL At first I was like whats with all the numbers and stuff, who cares?
>And then Leeroy takes off out of the blue and just his battle cry alone
>was too funny!
>
>Speaking of which I almost did a LJ last night by pure accident. We were
>over in GD and I ran up and almost into the frost giant castle which ov
>course would have trained all of them knowing my luck!
>
>LOL
>Durgaa
>
